item.description:
Ok Summer is on its way....Let's give it a great big welcome with a nice cookout party at the Willows.

What could be better than a nice sunny day at the willows, with friends, food and fun.

We will meet at 11:00AM, get the grills going and start cooking the burger and dogs.  Once we eat we can walk around, play some games, enjoy the view and have a great day with some great people.

The meetup Organizers will be supplying the Burgers, Hot Dogs & Rolls.  We will be looking for everyone to bring the other necessities to complete the Cookout.  When this event gets closer we will sending out a list of items so that people can volunteer to bring them.

So mark your calendars and plan on coming out to the willows.  Hope to see you there.

 

Janet & Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Table with the red baloon
item.name: Salem Willows Cookout
